name: damascus
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital city of Syria, in the southwestern part of the country: Our senior international correspondent is reporting live from Damascus. The finest sight in Damascus is, of course, the Ummayad Mosque.
More examplesFewer examplesWe arrived in Damascus the following morning.He lives in a small town 20 miles from Damascus.Saul of Tarsus is kneeling on the dusty road outside the city of Damascus.Although she was born in Damascus, Syria, she was raised in Lebanon.
